Today, the new Greenland away jersey is revealedâ€”a tribute to the Ice Sheet that shapes the land and its people. The design reflects the unyielding strength and quiet beauty of Greenland's frozen landscape, embodying patience, endurance, and unity.â â This jersey tells a story of identity, culture, and connection. Inspired by the Ice Sheet, which has stood firm for thousands of years against all challenges, it represents the resilience woven into the fabric of Greenlandic life.â â Shot on location in Greenland, the jersey captures the remote football community, where the bond between land and people stands as strong as the ice itself. â This is more than a jersey. Itâ€™s the nature of our culture!â
